summary: Based on the Internet comic strip, Multi-Cell Girl (a.k.a Dasepo sonyo) follows the sexual adventures in one seriously bizarre high school.
cast: Ok-bin Kim|Jin-woo Park|Kyeon Lee|Ha-Yoon Song|Yong-joo Lee|Oh-jeong Nam|Hye-won Park|Min-hyeok Lee|Geon Yu|Ji-Yeong Hong|Im Hye Jin|Jeong-rin Jo|Yoo-bin Kim|Yu-seon Ko|Byung-Joon Lee|Eun-seong Lee|Won-jong Lee|Yong-sik Park|Bong-gil Yoon
keywords: south korean sex comedy|high school|sexually transmitted disease|sex comedy|yodeling
title: Dasepo sonyo
